name: I Need More Room, Meow
description:
A point'n'click adventure.

  • One room, one cat and one mouse cursor;
  • A short but saturated story — play as the cat, save the day;
  • Click around, enjoy the consequences — it's that simple.

And don't forget to save the fish.

Made for Ludum Dare Jam (37):

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=p...

Homepage: http://oleggrachev.org/ineedmoreroom/
